title: Altmaer
author: Altmaer
content: Install this extension - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/crypto-price-tracker-pro/aamobldimcdiblkdcfjpkjglppaagofgVideo review - https://youtu.be/gE66WWWOuGwSource code - https://github.com/Altmaer/crypto-price-tracker-pro-chrome-extension---Crypto Price Tracker Pro is a comprehensive, open-source Chrome extension designed for cryptocurrency enthusiasts and traders, offering seamless real-time tracking of over 10,000 cryptocurrencies. Stay informed about the dynamic crypto market with this feature-rich extension that provides detailed information and customizable features to suit your specific needs.Key Features:Real-Time Price Updates: Get instant price updates for more than 10,000 cryptocurrencies, keeping you informed about the latest developments.Comprehensive Coin Details: Dive deep into each cryptocurrency's details, including market cap, volume, circulating supply, historical data, and much more. Make informed decisions with comprehensive insights at your fingertips.Customizable Watchlist: Create your personalized watchlist and track your favorite cryptocurrencies. Organize and prioritize your investments effortlessly.User-Friendly Interface: The extension offers an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it easy to navigate and understand even for newcomers to the crypto space.Open-Source and Transparent: Crypto Price Tracker Pro is an open-source project, built on the principles of transparency and community collaboration. Join our development community to contribute and improve the extension further.How to Use:Install the Crypto Price Tracker Pro Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store by following the link - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/crypto-price-tracker-pro/aamobldimcdiblkdcfjpkjglppaagofg.Once installed, the extension will add a small icon to your browser's toolbar.Click on the icon to launch Crypto Price Tracker Pro and start exploring real-time cryptocurrency prices, coin details, and other features.Enjoy the convenience of real-time crypto tracking directly from your Chrome browser.Stay updated on the ever-changing world of cryptocurrencies with Crypto Price Tracker Pro Real-Time Price Tracker. Take advantage of this open-source, customizable, and convenient extension to make informed decisions and optimize your cryptocurrency investments.Note: Crypto Price Tracker Pro is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice. Always conduct your research and consult with a professional financial advisor before making any investment decisions.Get started with Crypto Price Tracker Pro now and take control of your cryptocurrency investments!---Install this extension - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/crypto-price-tracker-pro/aamobldimcdiblkdcfjpkjglppaagofgVideo review - https://youtu.be/gE66WWWOuGwSource code - https://github.com/Altmaer/crypto-price-tracker-pro-chrome-extension---The Altmaer project.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Brand-new extension that was just published on chrome store on August 5, 2023. It's very hard to trust such an extension. It could be malware that could steal login credentials or crypto in no timeCan you talk about your privacy policy? What kind of data do you collect?

comments.author: Altmaer
comments.body: Hi, @Bitcoin_Arena.1) We collect none of your data. Absolutely none.2) This extension does not have access to websites you're visiting. For an extension to have such access, it must request permission in its manifest file. Only then will a warning be shown to users upon installation. When you install Crypto Price Tracker Pro, it doesn't ask for any permissions at all because we do not collect anything.3) Our extension is open-source. You can review its code at any time on GitHub - https://github.com/Altmaer/crypto-price-tracker-pro-chrome-extension.If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Thank you for your question.
